title: Fashion and creativity
description: Fashion designer Isaac Mizrahi spins through a dizzying array of inspirations -- from '50s pinups to a fleeting glimpse of a woman on the street who makes him shout "Stop the cab!" Inside this rambling talk are real clues to living a happy, creative life.
author: Isaac Mizrahi
keywords: TED, talks, business, creativity, design, entertainment, fashion, humor, media
